LJCDocDataLib.summary: Contains classes to represent and generate DocData XML.
LJCDocDataLib.remarks:
DocData XML data is generated from the PHP source files.

Contains classes for these functions:
- Represent a DocData Object Tree
- Serialize and Deserialize DocData XML 

DocData Object Graph:

			LJCDocDataFile
				Classes - LJCDocDataClasses
					LJCDocDataClass
						Methods - LJCDocDataMethods
							LJCDocDataMethod
								Params - LJCDocDataParams
									LJCDocDataParam
						Properties - LJCDocDataProperties
							LJCDocDataProperty
				Functions - LJCDocDataMethods
